channel.title: Womenintech on Ilona Who Codes
channel.description: Recent content in Womenintech on Ilona Who Codes

item.title: Ada Lovelace Festival 2017 in Berlin
item.description: The last week I have attended Ada Lovelace Festival that occurred on 19-20 October 2017. The aim of the event to connect women in computing and technology. Unfortunately, I was a bit too late for the keynote, because I had a lecture at the university. However, I joined the conference, and after registration, I got my bag with sponsors gifts. For example, a pen and a paper notebook from the WirtschaftsWoche, and a small car model and candies from Porsche.
